sentence.Network_en: We tried to grow some copper sulphate crystals with our children.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们想跟孩子们一起制作硫酸铜晶体。

sentence.Network_en: Adding sulphate to the solution will give a precipitate.
sentence.Network_cn: 将硫酸盐加入该溶液会产生沉淀.

sentence.Network_en: More ammonium sulphate solution is being recovered in the process of distilling oil shale.
sentence.Network_cn: 在提炼油页岩的过程中回收的硫酸铵液比过去多了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French sulfate, from Latin sulphur (see sulphur)

entry.def: A sulphate is a salt of sulphuric acid.

means.word_mean: 1. a salt or ester of sulphuric acid
